name: OBE
description:
On Board Experiential is a brand experience agency built from a team of creative problem solvers, driven by an entrepreneurial spirit, and motivated by a nothing-is-impossible mentality. We love what we do and the people we do it with. And we LOVE to nail every opportunity thrown at us. In a universe driven by recommendations, reviews and shares, OBE believes experiences are the secret sauce to keeping our clients’ brands at the center of the conversation.
We create connection through meaningful brand experiences that inspire audiences to speak personally about their participation in brand stories and deliver undeniable ROI. OBE has teams of experience makers comprised of strategists, designers, technologists, producers, and account leads in Los Angeles, San Francisco, and New York City. Our clients are some of the world’s most iconic brands and include Nike, Facebook, Apple, JPMorgan Chase, Activision, Kellogg’s, Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day, and Genentech. We’re honored to have made it onto Event Marketer’s 2018 It List for our 8th consecutive year, but we’re especially proud to be named as a “Best Place to Work In Events,” because without our unique, pioneering culture, our buzz-worthy work for our clients wouldn’t be possible. OBE's core offerings: Retail + Pop-ups, Press Events, Multi-Market Events, B2B Meetings + Events, Community Events, Sports + Entertainment Marketing, Mobile Marketing Tours, Conferences + Keynotes, Product Launches, Influencer Events, Trade Shows + Exhibitions, Interactive + Digital Experiences, Sponsorship Activations, Publicity Stunts and Internal Events.
